verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: The coach of the Republican baseball team] [V: says] [ARG1: he personally asked President Donald Trump to attend the annual game on Thursday , the anniversary of the shoot]

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — The coach of the Republican baseball team says [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MNR: personally] [V: asked] [ARG2: President Donald Trump] [ARG1: to attend the annual game on Thursday , the anniversary of the shoot]

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — The coach of the Republican baseball team says he personally asked [ARG0: President Donald Trump] to [V: attend] [ARG1: the annual game] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday , the anniversary of the shoot]
